short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick way to calculate your WWC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your old WWC spreadsheet is not necessary anymore!

You can quickly hit a button to have access to a calculator, with your customized weight sets.

Do not guess in a negotiation: you can change the weigh sets to see your final WWC instantly, making it easy to know the different between your old and new weights.
